required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study of Famitinib Malate on Healthy Chinese Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Single-dose, Randomized, Open-label and Two-cycle Crossover Bioequivalence Study of Famitinib Malate Capsules in Old and New Formulation on Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective is to evaluate the bioequivalence of famitinib malate capsules in new and old formulations after oral dose under fasted condition on healthy Chinese subjects.
The secondary objective is to evaluate the safety after famitinib malate capsules oral dose on healthy Chinese subjects.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Treatment group TR Intervention: Drug: famitinib malate, new formulation; Intervention: Drug: famitinib malate, old formulation. Treatment group RT Intervention: Drug: famitinib malate, old formulation; Intervention: Drug: famitinib malate, new formulation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 30 days
through study completion, an average of 30 days
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve（AUC）

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 30 days
through study completion, an average of 30 days
through study completion, an average of 30 days

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of participants with treatment-related adverse events assessed by CTCAE V5.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 30 days
secondary_outcome.description: An adverse event is any untoward medical occurrence in the subjects or clinical study participants.

arm_group.description: Intervention: Drug: famitinib malate, new formulation; Intervention: Drug: famitinib malate, old formulation.
Intervention: Drug: famitinib malate, old formulation; Intervention: Drug: famitinib malate, new formulation.

intervention.description: TR group: The first period，the subjects will be administrated with Famitinib malate in new formulation, then conduct blood collection within 192h; 14 days washout；The second period，the subjects will be administrated with Famitinib malate in old formulation, then conduct blood collection within 192h. RT group: The first period，the subjects will be administrated with Famitinib malate in old formulation, then conduct blood collection within 192h; 14 days washout；The second period，the subjects will be administrated with Famitinib malate in new formulation, then conduct blood collection within 192h.
